scripts.release:patch: pnpm run build && pnpm version patch && pnpm publish --no-git-checks
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run lint && pnpm run build && pnpm version minor && pnpm publish --no-git-checks
scripts.release:major: pnpm run lint && pnpm run build && pnpm version major && pnpm publish --no-git-checks
